# init()

**Initializer**

Initializes the magnetic field to a set of default values.

## Declaration

```swift
init()
```

## Initializers

- **init(field:accuracy:)**: Initializes the magnetic field to the specified set of values.

items.description: Initializes the magnetic field to the specified set of values.
